original: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘kalandakassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamaṁ taṁ ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban”ti?

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, kalandako paṭisattumhi opatante naṅguṭṭhaṁ papphoṭetvā mahantaṁ katvā teneva naṅguṭṭhalaguḷena paṭisattuṁ paṭibāhati;

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kilesasattumhi opatante satipaṭṭhānalaguḷaṁ papphoṭetvā mahantaṁ katvā teneva satipaṭṭhānalaguḷena sabbakilesā paṭibāhitabbā.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena kilesa sattumhi opatante sati paṭṭhāna laguḷam papphoṭetvā mahantam katvā tena iva sati paṭṭhāna laguḷena sabba kilesā paṭibāhitabbā

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, kalandakassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: ida mahā rāja kalandakassa ekam aṅgam
